PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: Hosting a website allows a business to scale their software to users on a particular Operating System or various operating systems. The user needs to choose a domain name with validity duration of at least 1 month and a server to grant requests of a client.
PRODUCT.DOMAINPRICE:
USD 22 (Domain name bundle [.com .org .info] first year)
USD 5 (Domain name first year)
PRODUCT.SERVERPRICE:
USD 168 (48 months server services)
USD 96 (24 months server services)
USD 48 (1 year server services)
